Class Client.CardImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Client.CardImage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    Enclosing class:
    Client

    private class Client.CardImage
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class to represent the image of card, pulled from the local "img" directory and rescaled as needed to fit within the context of the GUI.
